column5: site visit where we messed with the mast

Odd behavior in RH sensor at power on: Plausibly, when the tower was powered back on after being off, the (heated) RH sensor needed to warm and equillibrate. It seems this equillibration period is 15-30 min and has a characteristic shape: when the tower turns on the RH starts very low, increases very high then falls back to the accurate value. Instead of automating a screening procedure I just mannually screened the RH data.

abrupt jump in LWU and skin temp relative to others including the IRT.  Appears to slowly go away over the following hours.  End time is assumed.
caution about possible poor representation of T in SoS correction
